library(curl)
library(trendyy)

library(gtrendsR)
trends <- gtrends("PTI", geo = "PK") 
#View(trends)

plot<-ggplot(data=trend, aes(x=date, y=hits,group=keyword,col=keyword))+
  geom_line()+xlab('Time')+ylab('Relative Interest')+ theme_bw()+
  theme(legend.title = element_blank(),legend.position="bottom",legend.text=element_text(size=12))+ggtitle("Google Search Volume")

plot
View(trend)

library(gtrendsR)
library(tidyverse)
library(trendyy)
search_terms <- c("Imran Khan","Nawaz Sharif")
gtrends(keyword = search_terms,
        geo = "PK",
        time = "today 12-m") -> output_results
output_results %>% summary()
output_results %>% 
  .$interest_over_time %>%
  glimpse()

output_results %>%
  .$interest_over_time %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = hits)) +
  geom_line(colour = "darkblue", size = 1.5) +
  facet_wrap(~keyword) +
  ggthemes::theme_economist() -> plot
plot

"2019-01-01", "2020-08-13"
